article:
It was Sunday yesterday. Zhou Wei  _ to see his grandfather .His grandfather`s house was not far  _ his home . He rode his  _ to go there after he had breakfast . He rode along the streets and turned left at the first crossing. There  _ many trees on both sides of the street. At the _ 
Of the street,there was a large community. Many people lived ther. The traffic was Heavy. Zhou Wei didn`t obey the traffic rules.  _ he crossed the second crossing, a car hit him. Zhou Wei  fell down and couldn`t move. The driver took him to the
Hospital  at once . Luckily, he didn`t get hurt badly.
It`s  _  if we don`t obey the rules on the road. All of  _ should
be very careful when we are walking on the street.
